TopicTitle: hi my name is wil ranger and i need help?!!!!!!!

Articles.Content: where can i find the KSP Orbit Mechanic mod. when i click on it it just takes me to ksp forum so i have no idea where to go for that mod. same with the The Discovery Shuttle mod and the Nova Punch Remix Pack mod plus the Project Gemini mod, Silisko Industries Doughnut Research & Spacecraft Development mod included and the KW Challenger Pack mod, C7 Aviation Pack mod as well the nova punch remix pack mod download link doesn't even work it tacks you to a site that no longer works there is no download there. has anyone got any ideas?

Howdy, the Wil Ranger!

The orbital mechanic tool is located here under Addon Making/Addon Releases and Project Showcase/Tools and Applications (a wonder it doesn't get crushed under there).

*Edit: As for the others, just browse the Addons section. The more popular ones should be quick to find even if the search bar is being wonky.

Edited August 23, 2012 by tjoreilly
